name: Bike Racing Dangerous Stunts18
description:
Bike Racing Dangerous Stunts 18 is an action packed fun game. Live life on the edge! Drive your bike through amazing landscapes and perform some amazing stunts!Show off your riding skills in this exciting open world game! Feel the thrill of riding your motorbike around the city streets in real traffic and get a real city feel. Drive through traffic, complete missions and enjoy your ride!
-- Complete missions
-- Stunning 3D Graphics
-- Realistic open world environment
-- Different game modes
-- Superb bikes to choose from
-- Rich realistic traffic on roads.
-- Smooth and realistic bike handling
